```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = TRUE,
	message = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE
)
```

### Load Library

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


### Create data frame

```{r}
SN <- 1:5
A1 <- c(2, 3, 15, 16, 17)
B1 <- c(4, 5, 20, 17, 18)
C1 <- c(3, 17, 26, 48, 26)
  
data <- data.frame(SN, A1, B1, C1)
```

### Tidy Data

```{r}
n <- data %>% pivot_longer(cols = 3:4, 
                      names_to = "val", 
                      values_to = "no")
```

### Visualize

```{r}
ggplot(n, aes(x=SN,y=no, group=val, color = as.factor(val))) +
  geom_line(size=1)+ 
  scale_color_manual(values=c("red", "green" ,"black"))
```
